CustomField.description: Auto populated based on when the ERTC Conversation Outcome field is updated. This is to be used only until the ERTC Credit expires. To be evaluated in 6 months from creation date to if it needs to be removed/kept/repurposed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date/time the ERTC Conversation Outcome was set
CustomField.label: ERTC Outcome Date
